name: Dipartimento Europeo Sicurezza Informazioni
goal:
• ENCOURAGING AND INCREASING COOPERATION AMONG PEOPLE AND EUROPEAN COUNTRIES;

• SUPPORTING THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS OF INTERNATIONAL COOPERATION AND SOLIDARITY;

• SEALING THE BONDS OF FRIENDSHIP, ALLIANCE AND HARMONY BETWEEN THE VARIOUS MEMBERS OF THE INFORMATION, PROTECTION, SECURITY SERVICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF EUROPE AND AMONG THE SIGNATORIES OF THE NORTH ATLANTIC TREATY;

• COOPERATING AND PROVIDING INFORMATION AND SUPPORT TO PROJECTS PURSUED BY THE INSTITUTIONS AND GOVERNMENTAL AND INTERGOVERNMENTAL WORKING GROUPS CONCERNING EUROPEAN AND GLOBAL SECURITY;

• THE PROMOTION OF CULTURAL AND SOCIAL EXCHANGES, AS WELL AS EXPERIENCE AND INFORMATION AMONG THE POLICE AND OTHER SECURITY FORCES MEMBERS (INCLUDING SOCIAL FORCES), AT EUROPEAN LEVEL;

• THE DEVELOPMENT OF A COMMON SPIRIT OF OPENNESS TO MAJOR ISSUES, SUCH AS SOCIAL SECURITY, CIVIL DEFENSE, PEACE, ETC.;

• SPREADING THE CULTURE OF LEGALITY AND DIALOGUE IN AND OUTSIDE EUROPE ;

• ENCOURAGING AND INCREASING THE CREATION OF OPERATING, THEMATIC AND TECHNICAL GROUPS, AT NATIONAL AND EUROPEAN LEVEL, AIMED TO PROVIDE AND GUARANTEE VOLUNTEERING SERVICES, CIVIL AND SUBSIDIARY SOCIAL SECURITY, CIVIL DEFENSE, ROAD SAFETY, ETC.;

• PROTECTING THE ENVIRONMENT IN ORDER TO PREVENT CRIMES AGAINST PUBLIC PROPERTIES AND CULTURAL HERITAGE;

• DEVELOPING PARTNERSHIPS AND ARRANGING AGREEMENTS WITH LOCAL, REGIONAL, NATIONAL AND EUROPEAN AUTHORITIES, TO GUARANTEE THE SERVICES MENTIONED IN THE PREVIOUS POINT;

• CONTRIBUTING TO THE PROTECTION OF THE COMMON GOOD, THE HUMAN RIGHTS AND PEACE, THROUGH THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A SPECIAL DELEGATION TO FUNCTION AS AN “OBSERVATION AUTORITY” AT EUROPEAN AND EXTRA-EUROPEAN LEVEL AND, AT INTERNATIONAL LEVEL, IN AGREEMENT WITH COUNTRIES ASSOCIATED TO “UN” AND “OTAN”;
IN ORDER TO ACCOMPLISH THIS, THE ABOVE-MENTIONED DEPARTMENT MAY ESTABLISH DELEGATIONS, BODIES, SPECIAL SECTIONS, ALL WITH THEIR SPECIFIC PURPOSES, AND WILL THEN BE ABLE TO PURSUE THEM BY:

A) ORGANIZING SEMINARS, CONFERENCES, DEBATES, MEETINGS TO DISCUSS ABOUT SPECIFIC ISSUES CONCERNING COMMON INTEREST, AS WELL AS AWARENESS-RAISING EVENTS AND UNITED ACTIONS;

B) THE PUBLICATION AND DISTRIBUTION OF BROCHURES, BOOKS AND MAGAZINES WITH THE SOLE SOCIAL PURPOSE OF RAISING AWARENESS AND INFORM ASSOCIATES AND THE COMMUNITY ABOUT SOCIAL, ECONOMIC, LEGAL AND POLITICAL PROBLEMS OF THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY;

C) OFFERING OUR COLLABORATION, CONSULTATION, DOCUMENTATION AND STUDIES TO OTHERS, WETHER PUBLIC OR PRIVATE ENTITIES, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS, IN ORDER TO ENSURE AND REINFORCE THE PRINCIPLES OF PEACE, SOLIDARITY AND UNIVERSAL COOPERATION;

D) CREATING A CENTRE FOR UNIVERSITY STUDIES, RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY OF SECURITY AND PREVENTION, AWARDING SCHOLARSHIPS (AS WELL AS OTHER ECONOMIC AIDS) TO SUPPORT THE STUDY OF INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS;

E) CREATING CONTEXTS OF EXCHANGE TO IMPROVE AND STRENGTHEN THE RELATIONS BETWEEN LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES AND CITIZENS ON A GLOBAL SCALE, INSTILLING CIVIC SENSE, RESPECT FOR THE LAWS AND CULTURE OF COMMUNION AND LEGALITY INTO THE YOUNGER GENERATION.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: studi di ricerca e analisi  sulla difesa europea, sul fenomeno del terrorismo ed immigrazione.
